thread.title: Girl finds out the painful way why you don’t have a messy room (6 Photos)
thread.title_full: Girl finds out the painful way why you don’t have a messy room (6 Photos)

author: Travis
title: Girl finds out the painful way why you don’t have a messy room (6 Photos)
text:
Twitter 
When you’re a kid cleaning your room is the equivalent to tripping in the cafeteria or if you’re like me puking on your first grade teacher. 
Julia Pecher is an 18-year-old senior who recently discovered why having a clean room is key. While trying to grab some freshly popped popcorn she stepped on something hiding under her disaster of a room. 
“So, I was laying in my bed watching Netflix and I heard my microwave go off. I was cooking popcorn. I got so excited that I literally jumped off of my bed. I landed right on the charger,” Pechar said. 2 
Pecher quickly snapped a photo and tweeted it before her mom could take it out. The tweet currently has over 14,000 retweets. 3
